name: Black Letterman Leather Sleeve Raglan V-neck
description:

A custom MT Letterman design with a real jersey number feel to it.

Black T-shirt with a slim cut designed to give this shirt good fit. 

A modern version of the traditional baseball raglan with a custom v-neck design. 

RECOMMEND SIZING UP FOR LOOSE FIT!

Soft and lightweight high quality cotton from Australia.  
Australian Cotton (95% Cotton - 5% Lycra) construction
Durable  neckband
Raglan cut short sleeves
Instructions: DRY CLEAN ONLY!

name: Gameday Letterman Baseball Tee
description:
Men's Black & White Baseball Shirt A custom MT Letterman design with a real jersey number feel to it. Black sleeves, white body baseball style raglan tee with black and red screened MT Logo on front. Real baseball cut design for the bottom of the raglan.
A modern version of the traditional baseball raglan. Soft and lightweight in a Poly-Cotton blend.
  • Poly-Cotton (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) construction

  • Raglan 3/4 sleeves
Instructions: Wash with Cold Water. Hang Dry.
